name: SLICEY Dungeon
description:
Are you ready to SLICE through monsters, craft swords, make sacrifices, complete quests, level up, and explore your own personalized dungeon?

SLICEY Dungeon is a randomly generated rogue-like slice-based dungeon crawler.

Every time you start the game, you will encounter a brand new randomly generating dungeon with custom quests, brand new style, tons of loot, and lots of personalized fun.
